ygData.subject: Anti Kill Stealing
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I am just so jealous of you all on your feel good severs.  On Rallos Zek we can t stop steal killers using this method.  You can still inflict damage on
ygData.messageBody:
>now if you have an enchanter friend or a high level bard friend who can mez
>and memblur or charm... well that's another story - hehe love to see the
>evil killstealer casters burn that mana casting on a charmed mob <eg>


I am just so jealous of you all on your feel good severs. On Rallos Zek we
can't stop steal killers using this method. You can still inflict damage on
charmed mobs, ince it is at that time considered someone's pet. I once
tried to teach a group of lv 20 steal killers a lesson by charming the mobs
they were attacking (they stole kill from my girlfriend's character earlier
that day). Needless to say I was laughed at. On the up side, you CAN charm
a PK(or fear them for that matter) and have your level 50 wizard friends zap
the hell out of a player they could otherwise not hit since they have a
linkdead "flag" set upon becoming charmed or feared. Now THERE's some bard
revenge for you.
